name: 15th International Conference and Expo on Separation Techniques
content: Dear Colleague, Greetings!! We are Inviting you to attend “15th International Conference and Expo on Separation Techniques on October 14-15, 2019” provides the perfect platform for an interactive and engaging 2-day event: unique in format, content, networking and engagement. The event brings together truly innovative thinkers who are leading the way through trialing new disruptive solutions and rethinking the conventions in Separation Techniques. Separation Techniques 2019 covers a wide range of critically important sessions from basic research to recent innovations. It is especially conducted to learn and share knowledge on current research and New trends in Separation Techniques . The main theme of the conference is “Innovative Methods & Techniques in Emerging Separation Technologies" The conference will also provide delegates opportunity with space to explore their knowledge and understanding of the latest scientific advancements. Your expertise and knowledge in the area would add a great value to the young scientists as well as scientific community. For more details about Separation techniques Conference, PS: https://separationtechniques.chemistryconferences.org/ Regards Jessie Koch | Program Director Separation Techniques 2019 Conferences 47 Church field Road, London, W3 6AY Ph: 8000148923 Whatsapp: +441133206997 Email: separationtechniques@expertsgathering.com
